title: Gen. Wesley Clark says US planned in 2001 to take over 7 countries in 5 years – Syria is one
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The former supreme allied commander of NATO during the Kosovo War General Wesley Clark revealed to Amy Goodman in an interview in March 2007 that US planned in 2001 to take down 7 countries in 5 years starting off with Iraq. The 7 nations are Iraq. Libya, Somalia,…
